item.title: Disruptive Metro Ethernet over Fiber Pricing Arrives
item.description:
The increasing use of Ethernet over Fiber (EoF) by large companies, as a cheaper option compared to SONET fiber optic services, has made many believe that fiber optic technology is only for big players. However, that notion is no longer true, as affordable fiber optic bandwidth is now accessible to all. The surprising reason behind the unexpectedly low cost of Mbps or Gbps bandwidth, often half the anticipated price or even less, is Cable TV...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/disruptive-metro-ethernet-over-fiber-pricing-arrives/
